After an accident, a talented songwriter transforms into a messenger of love by connecting people who having trouble finding love and expressing their feelings.
A groom-to-be sets off with his friend to finding a new owner for his puppy.

An ordinary man who has never known love, struggles to talk to his crush who goes to work on the same bus as him every day. Things started to change when he acquires a strange perfume that has the power to attract women...
A nobleman who has passed the national civil service exam, meets the self-proclaimed best chef in Joseon, falls into the world of gourmet food and sets out to find the life he truly wants.
Set four years after the zombie outbreak, a former soldier and his team return to the zombie-infested wastelands to retrieve a truck of money and try to escape from it alive.
A mentally challenged father who's wrongly jailed for the murder of a young girl reunites with her young daughter in the prison.
Mi-yeon and her son Ki-hoon run a noodle restaurant. Her daughter, Ji-eun left for her dream. One day, Mi-yeon is diagnosed with a disease. Will this family be able to protect each other?
While a zombie-virus breaks out in South Korea, passengers including a father and young daughter, a couple, and several students struggle to survive on the train from Seoul to Busan.
The gang competes to see who can best train a Terrible Terror, while Alvin is closing in on Berk.
When different species of dragons are found on Dragon Island, the kids suspect that the Screaming Death might be back and it's up to an unlikely hero to save the day.

After Boss accidentally sells Tim's favorite Football Mike toy at a family yard sale, he shirks his duties as a CEO to try to get it back. But the villains pick up on his one weakness, his brother, and so begins a game of elaborate keep-away.

The combined villains have taken over Baby Corp HQ, and a disastrous chupie teleportation accident has all the office babies scattered to the wind. Boss has to regain his leadership gusto to convince Baby Corp to regroup, as Tim and Danny share an emotional last day together before Danny leaves town for good.

With the Baby Corp babies exiled from their office and hiding in the Templeton basement, Boss and a trusted team storm Baby Corp to take it back from the villains. Having decided to retire and pass the CEO-ship onto to Staci, he also prepares Tim for her new life as an older brother to just a normal baby brother.

When Odlulu uses the Bubble Key to raise a sunken ship in the Bahamas, the Wanderers and Wizard Doubloon must take to the high-seas to catch this bubble-wielding buccaneer before she makes away with the ship's booty.

The Thompson's family pigeon, Cedric, has been reported found in Northern Ireland. Pat must take Dorothy and Bill to help bring him back in the SDS Plane. Meanwhile Alf camps out at the sorting office, pining for his beloved Cedric's return. Once in Ireland, Pat meets the man who found Cedric and Dorothy manages to charm him down from his roof. Unfortunately an inopportune phone call from Alf startles cedric and causes him to take up a roost on a cliff face with a friendly puffin. With Alf causing chaos trying "help" Ben tidy up the Sorting office in Pencaster, Pat exercises his climbing skills to retrieve Cedric but it takes a brave abseil from Dorothy and Sean to finally lure the wayward bird back to its rightful owners.

It is nap time in the Jingly Jangly Jungle but Raa Raa is not tired and is determined to play hide and seek with his friends, whether they like it or not! But all this running about can be tiring work for a noisy little lion cub…

The Pirates are searching for the long-lost Fable Forest Gold. If they can't find it they might have to stop being pirates for good! Noddy leaps into action to help them. Using all his investigating skills, asking who, what, where, when, why and how and with the help of the wwwbook Noddy follows the clues and finds the gold! Now the pirates can stay in Toyland and hunt for treasure forever! Hurrah for Noddy!

An earth-shaking rumble signals the arrival of a new creature, but Yi and Jin butt heads, each convinced they’re the better team leader. The crew eventually discovers that the massive Sewer Koi is behind the earthquakes, but he’s missing his precious pearl, the key to a magical underground dam. Without it, the sewer’s water levels will rise, threatening to overflow and flood the whole city! It’s going to take a heist to extract the pearl from its display at a local museum, before it’s too late.

Kelps learns about memory spark in an attempt to relive a memory of his grandmother. / Kelp and the underwater gang put on a show to showcase their imaginary sparks. As she practices, however, Scallop becomes convinced her tusk has a real spark!
Kelp is excited to celebrate his right of passage, breaking the ice with his horn. But when he struggles to break the ice like other narwhals, he is determined to do it “the Kelp way.”

Based on PD Eastman's classic children’s book, Go, Dog. Go! Follows 6-year-old dog, Tag Barker, on her hilarious adventures in the city of Pawston, a fun-loving community of dogs on the go. Tag is a skilled mechanic and loves anything that goes. With her ingenuity and creativity, Tag can go as far as any plan will take her, always with her best friend, Scooch Pooch, by her side. Scooch’s easy-going nature is the perfect counterbalance to Tag’s high-octane energy. But as much as Tag loves to go, she’s often reminded that it's family, friends and neighbors that really fuel a community.

When Tag and Scooch learn that Sandra Paws' sleigh broke down on a mountain, they have to go on an adventure to fix the sleigh and save Sniffs-mas! Meanwhile, Beans tries to get a grumpy Frank to feel the Sniffs-mas spirit.

When the crew takes on a mission to help Ian get some rest for a Badminton Tournament, Jax realises that the biggest approach isn't always the best approach. / When Lula loses her comic book, Ari learns that the best heroes rely on teamwork and not gadgets.

When a pesky gopher gets in the way of Fawna making her famous veggie stew, Niah learns to not let a bad experience, get in the way of doing good. / When the inexperienced Rona has to step in for Donna, the team makes sure everyone has the best camping trip ever.
The Riders have to save Elbone when he's swallowed by a giant Sea Gronckle, and Dak's awful cooking might be just the thing to do it.
At a big town festival, Magnus challenges Duggard in a competition to be chief of Huttsgalor! Can the Riders help their friend keep his helmet?

When the townsfolk decorate the Harmony Harbor holiday tree but lose the treetop star, TZG secretly search for it in the yard of a notoriously scary house. / When it transpires the house is not-so-scary after all and belongs to shy inventor Dr. Greenlittle, TZG secretly leads her to the big Harmony Harbor sing-along so that she doesn't have to spend the holiday alone.

programme.title: On the brink of his highly-anticipated White Coat Ceremony at school, Jin proudly dons his new white doctor’s coat around town, unwittingly drawing the attention of a creature named Morty. After a slobbery lick from Morty, Jin turns invisible! As Jin frantically tries to become re-visible, he discovers that Morty is very pregnant! Ultimately, Jin foregoes his ceremony and instead delivers Morty’s five babies.

Already stretched thin between responsibilities, Yi discovers one of Morty’s babies still in her building. She attempts to juggle her various responsibilities dumpling shop work, violin, magical creature childcare!), but it’s too much and she accidentally “loses” Mini-Morty. The Thompson's family pigeon, Cedric, has been reported found in Northern Ireland. Pat must take Dorothy and Bill to help bring him back in the SDS Plane. Meanwhile Alf camps out at the sorting office, pining for his beloved Cedric's return. Once in Ireland, Pat meets the man who found Cedric and Dorothy manages to charm him down from his roof. Unfortunately an inopportune phone call from Alf startles cedric and causes him to take up a roost on a cliff face with a friendly puffin. With Alf causing chaos trying "help" Ben tidy up the Sorting office in Pencaster, Pat exercises his climbing skills to retrieve Cedric but it takes a brave abseil from Dorothy and Sean to finally lure the wayward bird back to its rightful owners.

It is nap time in the Jingly Jangly Jungle but Raa Raa is not tired and is determined to play hide and seek with his friends, whether they like it or not! But all this running about can be tiring work for a noisy little lion cub…

The Pirates are searching for the long-lost Fable Forest Gold. If they can't find it they might have to stop being pirates for good! Noddy leaps into action to help them. Using all his investigating skills, asking who, what, where, when, why and how and with the help of the wwwbook Noddy follows the clues and finds the gold! Now the pirates can stay in Toyland and hunt for treasure forever! Hurrah for Noddy!

An earth-shaking rumble signals the arrival of a new creature, but Yi and Jin butt heads, each convinced they’re the better team leader. The crew eventually discovers that the massive Sewer Koi is behind the earthquakes, but he’s missing his precious pearl, the key to a magical underground dam. Without it, the sewer’s water levels will rise, threatening to overflow and flood the whole city! It’s going to take a heist to extract the pearl from its display at a local museum, before it’s too late.

Kelps learns about memory spark in an attempt to relive a memory of his grandmother. / Kelp and the underwater gang put on a show to showcase their imaginary sparks. As she practices, however, Scallop becomes convinced her tusk has a real spark!
Kelp is excited to celebrate his right of passage, breaking the ice with his horn. But when he struggles to break the ice like other narwhals, he is determined to do it “the Kelp way.”

Based on PD Eastman's classic children’s book, Go, Dog. Go! Follows 6-year-old dog, Tag Barker, on her hilarious adventures in the city of Pawston, a fun-loving community of dogs on the go. Tag is a skilled mechanic and loves anything that goes. With her ingenuity and creativity, Tag can go as far as any plan will take her, always with her best friend, Scooch Pooch, by her side. Scooch’s easy-going nature is the perfect counterbalance to Tag’s high-octane energy. But as much as Tag loves to go, she’s often reminded that it's family, friends and neighbors that really fuel a community.

When Tag and Scooch learn that Sandra Paws' sleigh broke down on a mountain, they have to go on an adventure to fix the sleigh and save Sniffs-mas! Meanwhile, Beans tries to get a grumpy Frank to feel the Sniffs-mas spirit.

When the crew takes on a mission to help Ian get some rest for a Badminton Tournament, Jax realises that the biggest approach isn't always the best approach. / When Lula loses her comic book, Ari learns that the best heroes rely on teamwork and not gadgets.

When a pesky gopher gets in the way of Fawna making her famous veggie stew, Niah learns to not let a bad experience, get in the way of doing good. / When the inexperienced Rona has to step in for Donna, the team makes sure everyone has the best camping trip ever.
The Riders have to save Elbone when he's swallowed by a giant Sea Gronckle, and Dak's awful cooking might be just the thing to do it.
At a big town festival, Magnus challenges Duggard in a competition to be chief of Huttsgalor! Can the Riders help their friend keep his helmet?

Ultimately, Jin foregoes his ceremony and instead delivers Morty’s five babies.

She attempts to juggle her various responsibilities dumpling shop work, violin, magical creature childcare!), but it’s too much and she accidentally “loses” Mini-Morty. Slaves fervently wishing to live like a human being VS. Slave hunters chasing them tirelessly. A bloody battle between them begins to take place!!! Being a slave hunter, Daegil is disregarded by people due to his low social status. While doing his job, Daegil is offered by Lee Gyongsuk to get Song Taeha and is promised to be given a fair amount of money as a reward. Taeha was forced to become a state slave as he was wrongfully accused of stealing some provisions. After reading a secret message saying the life of Sohyeons youngest son is on the line, Taeha tries to escape in an attempt to save him, the eldest son of the Crown Prince. Daegil, however, gets wind of his plan and the two ends up fighting a bloody fight. Having barely escaped from the fierce fight, Taeha happens to accompany a woman named Hyewon. Daegil fails to track down the slave he was first assigned to capture, and constantly runs into Seolhwa who escaped from a troupe of strolling actors. To make things worse, Daegil is threatened to be killed by a group of slaves who formed a hit squad to assassinate nobles. As for Daegil, he has every reason to be successful in accomplishing his first mission. Aside from recovering his pride hurt by Taeha, Daegil needs a sizable sum of money to live a comfortable life in his old age. In the end, Taeha manages to run away from Daegil while Daegil feels affection for Hyewon.

programme.title: The series enters its third season riding high as network television's top-rated drama. There is, therefore, no need for CBS to make any major cast changes, however, there are two significant additions to the cast lineup for season 3. A romantic interest is created for series regular Jorja Fox (Sara Sidle) in the form of Hank Peddigrew (Christopher Wiehl), a handsome paramedic. Also, recurring character Detective Lockwood ( Jeffrey D. Sams ) is seen on a more frequent basis. The season's most significant story development involves CSI head man Gil Grissom ( William L. Petersen ). After a few instances in which he notices that he is experiencing some hearing loss, Grissom is diagnosed with a hereditary disorder which threatens to culminate in total deafness. As the season draws to a close, Grissom undergoes surgery to correct this problem, however the results of the operation remain unclear until the beginning of season four.
programme.desc: CSI S3 E04 - A Little Murder

Petersen ). After a few instances in which he notices that he is experiencing some hearing loss, Grissom is diagnosed with a hereditary disorder which threatens to culminate in total deafness. As the season draws to a close, Grissom undergoes surgery to correct this problem, however the results of the operation remain unclear until the beginning of season four.

Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. In the season finale, the guys toy with customers at a candy store using bizarre party props, they all try their hands at nosing, and they break the rules of appropriate elevator etiquette.

Kevin and Brooke search for the ultimate lipstick hack, explore beeswax as a waterproofing technique, and welcome an old tire into the All-Star Club. Plus, this week's "Hack Master" will go to the extreme by hacking Kevin's brain.

Kevin and Brooke put the best shaving hacks to the test in the ultimate beard-off, and find out if using a drill to eat corn is hack or wack. Plus, they'll welcome toothpaste into the All-Star Club and use pencil lead to make a light bulb.

This hour, the joke's on you... and on 20 of the World's Dumbest Pranksters. Their tricks include everything from a terrifying wake up call, to telekinesis, and a not-so-dead body in the trunk of a taxi. With real jokes provided by our cast of hilarious comedians, including Mike Trainor, Chris Fairbanks, and Katlyn Carlson.
While Riggs tries to find a connection with his father, Murtaugh gives his daughter driving lessons, and the team faces a dangerous incident that tests their trust.
When a dangerous criminal from Lance's past (MICHAEL EKLUND) escapes from prison, Felicity offers herself up as bait so Arrow, Diggle and Lance can capture him...but plans go awry.
The team crosses paths with a businessman who may have been the intended target. Deputy Inspector Haywood tries to help a troubled teen. Killian is at odds with his girlfriend.
Still in Hawaii, Sean takes the bidders deep into the island to hidden storage bunkers. Conflict arises between the locals and Sean's usual's, but who will be victorious?

Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. In the season finale, the guys toy with customers at a candy store using bizarre party props, they all try their hands at nosing, and they break the rules of appropriate elevator etiquette.

Close your eyes. Open your mind. You will be unprepared. From the Spartan slaughter of 300 to the visionary world of Watchmen, writer/director/producer Zack Snyder has transported audiences into visual dreamscapes of his creation. His latest cinematic mind trip takes us into the vivid imagination of a young girl (The Uninvited's Emily Browning) whose dream world provides the ultimate escape from her darker institutionalized reality. Unrestrained by the boundaries of time and place, she is free to go where her mind takes her, but her incredible adventures blur the lines between what's real and what is imaginary. Locked away against her will, but determined to fight for her freedom, she and four other girls battle everything from serpents tosamurais on an unbelievable journey to set themselves free. Like "Alice in Wonderland with machine guns," Snyder's epic action fantasy is filmed in such a way that the action sequences aren't limited by physical real...

Prestige Chinese documentary production, tackling serious subjects with the best cinematography, editing, and all round production values with a unique Chinese perspective.
A documentary series showcasing the history of China and its people.
A documentary series featuring historical and archaeological exploration.
Food connects people! A feast for the eyes that spotlights the cuisines of China in a way that’s bound to set the mouths of the whole globe watering!
The youth of a country is the future of that country. A series of documentaries focusing on the younger generation of China in which you get to see what they are achieving and what makes them tick!
A well-crafted collage of selected short documentaries telling stories about all aspects of China! People, technology, culture, and wildlife, all are showcased in Internet-friendly form.

Documentaries in this slot are rebroadcasts of our most-viewed and most popular stories of the season. They feature important social, economic, environmental or other policy-driven issues, affecting lives nationwide or simply in one small village. A broad selection of top productions by Chinese top documentary producers.
A strand devoted to the nature and wildlife of China, the people who lived alongside them, and the great and diverse landscapes with which they all contend.

Real life stories told from the personal perspective. Moving, dramatic, sorrows and joys, expressed emphatically and expressed quietly. Watch closely to see and understand the real China as it is lived.

Trapped in an abandoned house, a young man desperately searches for clues about his trapped situation. The unsettling truth actually lies in a sequence of viral videos and they gradually corrupt his mind…

When Roy, Lia and their daughter are attacked by an evil spirit at home, Lia sacrifices herself to save their lives. A year later, Roy arranges a spiritualist to protect their home and keep them safe from evil. As Good Friday approaches though, more haunted and terrifying events happen in their house. Can they finally overcome the evil spirit?

Richie is a suicidal young man who finds himself very much alive every time he kills himself, although there will be a dead body of him in his apartment after each suicide attempt. Richie’s sister comes to his rescue and discovers the piled up dead bodies in the house. What keeps bringing Richie back?

Suspended psychiatrist Huang is asked to treat Zhao who suffers from schizophrenia. Zhao can only release himself from the pain of his girlfriend's death by killing people in his delusion. During the treatment, Huang is gradually affected by Zhao. He soon finds the way to cure Zhao, but then discovers an important secret about himself.

Boo is a human marrying an aswang, Malou, to save her life, but he soon turns into an aswang as well to escape the pursue of other aswangs. After having three children, Boo and Malou decide to start a more normal and less monstrous family life in Manila. Can they start anew?

Two female university students go to an isolated hot springs resort for vacation. However, they soon find out that the resort village is the home for lunatics who plan to strap them to crosses and slash their legs. Can they escape from danger in the end?

Ruo Wei returns to her childhood home with two best friends, and reunites with her cousin who has always lived there. While they plan to enjoy their trip, they are constantly haunted by paranormal events, ending up in a terrifying experience with unexpected outcome.
In Derbyshire, England, a spirit sticks around the remains of a satanic ritual. A man in Stephan, South Dakota witnesses a shadow figure in an abandoned Native American high school.
When a young woman vanishes, detectives zero in on her controlling estranged husband—whose story continually changes in the interrogation room.
When an up-and-coming defense attorney is murdered in her office, her colleagues vow to seek justice and "make this right."
Iowa home-baker, Justina Rucinski, had just received the largest cookie request of her career. But when the customer arrived at Justina's house, she was brutally attacked and taken away at gunpoint.
When a man is gunned down while walking his dogs in a quiet park, surveillance video leads detectives to an unlikely suspect.
Bergen County (NJ) Chief of Detectives Robert Anzilotti elicited murder confessions from a vicious but relatively unknown serial killer — Richard Cottingham, nicknamed the Torso Killer.

With the help of digital forensics, authorities are able to debunk the alibi of one of the last people to see a 24-year-old missing jogger in rural Arkansas, making him the primary suspect in her murder.
Shayna Hubers takes the stand to defend herself after she brutally murdered her on-again, off-again boyfriend, Ryan Poston. She willingly takes the stand to prove her actions were in self-defense.

A man is arrested for driving his golf cart while intoxicated and refuses a breathalyser test. A young man with LSD and hashish learns the hard way that hanging with underage girls is a very bad idea.

When a man is found shot and dumped on the road, detectives learn how his struggle to overcome obstacles left him headed for a collision with someone on the edge.
A young woman hides in a closet as an intruder enters her home. After a fire breaks out, two women are trapped by a wall of flames, and a woman and her daughter try to fight off an erratic carjacker.

Marjorie has collected items from thrift stores and estate sales over the years for various projects, which has led to a massive amount of clutter in her home, making living in the space very difficult.
A look at some of the wildest courtroom moments: A convicted hitman loses control in court; a tardy defendant drops an F-bomb during a Zoom hearing; a judge fights for his parking space; and more.

A look at some of the wildest courtroom moments: a violent felon attacks a prosecutor in court; a judge has heard enough from a Sovereign Citizen; a murdered NBA star's mother blows up in court; and more.
A couple is shot to death on their doorstep, and detectives have to track down the killer. In Louisville, a hearing-impaired man is stabbed in his doorway. And a woman's body is found in a trash can.
A visit to Mobile ends in tragedy when a violent chain reaction leads to the death of a teenage girl.
After Nicole’s murder, OJ's behaviour grows increasingly erratic and bizarre. Placed squarely in the LAPD's crosshairs as the prime suspect, he leads them on a slow-speed chase down the 405.
programme.desc: The Life & Murder Of Nicole Brown Simpson

programme.title: Chilling accounts of children in danger and the people who fought to protect them. Stories of children who experienced the unthinkable: six girls hunted and murdered in their neighbourhoods; and more.

A couple in North Carolina shares their home with a shadow figure. A werewolf stalks a man's backyard in Brazil. A store in Taiwan has a ghostly customer. Plus much more terrifying paranormal footage.

These episodes discuss about people, animals, plants, landforms and bodies of water, and their importance. These also talk about the types and effects of weather as they relate to daily activities, health and safety, and the natural objects in the sky affect one’s daily activities.
These episodes focus on the process of planning, setting up, and running a small business. These episodes also talk about entrepreneurial skills.

These episodes teach about the characteristics and needs of animals and plants and how they grow and the physical properties and movement of objects. These also talk about the different types of weather and changes that occur in the environment, the concepts of size, length, weight, time, and money, and the sense of quantity and numeral relations.

Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pagsusuri ng mga pabula, tugma, tula, balita, at kuwento. Pinakikita rin dito ang tamang paggamit ng malalaki at maliliit na titik, mga pangngalan, at tamang pagbasa ng mga salita.
These episodes discuss time and non-standard units of length, mass and capacity. These episodes also talk about pictographs without scales and outcomes of an event.
These episodes talk about action words and describing words. These episodes also teach about sorting and classifying words and following directions.
Sa mga palabas na ito ipapaliwanag ang konsepto ng distansya sa paglalarawan ng sariling kapaligirang ginagalawan tulad ng tahanan at paaralan at ng kahalagahan ng pagpapanatili at pangangalaga nito.

Sa mga palabas na ito matutuhan natin ang tungkol sa pagpapantig, pagbibigay ng kahulugan sa mga salita, pagbuo ng mga pangungusap, at pagbabasa ng teksto. Tinatalakay din dito ang mga pang-ukol, pang-abay, at salitang kilos.
These episodes talk about time, standard measures of length, mass and capacity and area using square-tile units. These also deepen the understanding about pictographs without and with scales.
These episodes teach about pronouns and prepositions. These episodes also show how to read, match, and write words that use short vowels.
Sa mga palabas na ito tatalakayin ang pagpapahalaga sa kagalingang pansibiko bilang pakikibahagi sa mga layunin ng sariling komunidad.

Sa mga palabas na ito tinatalakay ang tungkol sa mga pangngalan, panghalip, at iba't ibang elemento ng kuwento. Ipapaliwanag din dito ang pagsusulat ng mga kuwento at pagbibigay ng kahulugan ng mga salita.
These episodes teach about conversion of time, linear, mass and capacity measures and area of square and rectangle. These episodes also talk about bar graphs and outcomes of an event.
These epsiodes are about adjectives, adverbs, maps and graphs. These episodes also show how to read words and restate facts from texts.

Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa gawaing pangkabuhayan at bahaging ginagampanan ng pamahalaan at ang mga kasapi nito, mga pinuno at iba pang naglilingkod tungo sa pagkakaisa, kaayusan at kaunlaran ng mga lalawigan sa kinabibilangang rehiyon.

These episodes discuss about people, animals, plants, landforms and bodies of water, and their importance. These also talk about the types and effects of weather as they relate to daily activities, health and safety, and the natural objects in the sky affect one’s daily activities.

Sa mga palabas na ito ipapaliwanag ang iba't ibang uri ng pangungusap at ang paggamit ng balangkas sa pagpapakita ng nakalap na impormasyon. Matutuhan din dito kung paano magpahayag ng sariling opinyon o reaksyon.
These episodes explain the concept of area and volume of triangles, parallelograms and trapezoids. These episodes also teach about bar graphs and simple experiments.
These episodes are about writing short stories and journals. These episodes also talk about different sources of information.
Sa mga palabas na ito matutuhan natin ang pang-unawa at pagpapahalaga sa kaniyang mga karapatan at tungkulin bilang mamamayang Filipino.

These episodes teach about the different types of soil, the different sources of water suitable for human consumption, components of weather using simple instruments, and the Sun as the main source of heat and light on Earth.
Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pagpapahayag at pagsusulat ng sariling opinyon o reaksyon, pagsusuri ng tekstong binasa o napanood, at paggawa ng dayagram.
These episodes are about volume of solid figures, meter reading, pie graphs and experimental probability.
These episodes are about composing clear and coherent sentences and writing a persuasive essay.
Sa mga palabas na ito ay tumatalakay sa pag-unawa at pagpapahalaga sa patuloy na pagpupunyagi ng mga Filipino tungo sa pagtugon sa mga hamon ng nagsasarili at umuunlad na bansa.

These episodes explain the effects of earthquakes and volcanic eruptions, the weather patterns and seasons in the Philippines, the Earth’s rotation and revolution, and characteristics of planets in the solar system.
Sa mga palabas na ito susuriin ang iba't ibang akda ayon sa mga elemento nito. Tatalakayin din dito ang pagpapahayag ng pansariling paniniwala at malikhaing pagsusulat.
These episodes explain the key concepts of inequalities in a triangle, and parallel and perpendicular lines. These episodes also teach about the key concepts of probability.
These episodes talk about the different sources of information and grammatical signals. These also talk about communicating skills and writing paragraphs.

Ang mga palabas na ito ay tumatalakay sa kahalagahan ng pakikipag- ugnayan at sama-samang pagkilos sa kontemporanyong daigdig tungo sa pandaigdigang kapayapaan, pagkakaisa, pagtutulungan, at kaunlaran.

These episodes discuss about the digestive system and its interaction with other body systems, the diseases that result from nutrient deficiency and ingestion of harmful substances. These episodes also talk about how cells divide to produce new cells, meiosis, the concept of species, and the one-way flow of energy and the cycling of materials in an ecosystem.

Ang mga palabas na ito ay tumatalakay sa iba't ibang akda at maikling kuwento na may kinalaman sa kulturang Asyano. Susuriin din dito ang mga tauhan, mahahalagang pangyayari, at kaisipan sa binasang akda.
These episodes explain the key concepts of measures of position.
These episodes focus on writing research reports, giving definitions, and observing correct grammar.
Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa kahalagahan ng pagkamamamayan at pakikilahok sa mga gawaing pansibiko tungo sa pagkakaroon ng pamayanan at bansang maunlad, mapayapa, at may pagkakaisa.

These episodes teach about how gases behave based on the motion and relative distances between gas particles, the structure of biomolecules. These episodes also explain the chemical reactions associated with biological and industrial processes affecting life and the environment.
These episodes feature different short animations and documentaries that are related to arts and culture.

In Ivan Claes' trunk, Laurent discovers a bloody towel and Marina's bracelet. He gives them to Paul for analysis, but the latter burns them. Laurent drags him into the forest, ready to kill him if he won't tell him where his daughter is buried. But Paul isn't the murderer...

Will hydrogen one day replace kerosene? Is ''carbon neutral'' flight really possible? Why is flying still cheaper than the train? We answer all these questions with Camille Mutrelle, from the NGO Transport et Environnement.

Arles amphitheatre is buzzing with excitement as the queen of the town is about to be named! But she doesn't come forward after her name is announced. A corpse is found instead of her in the royal carriage: the corpse of the election organiser.

Passionate about French chic, ambassadress Katherina Marx surrounds herself with major figures from the worlds of fashion, design, gastronomy, and fine living. Each episode features an iconic guest and a series of special reports, allowing viewers to discover or rediscover France, its young designers, and its chic and trendy hang-outs.
International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

The whole world, in French.
Magazine programme which explores issues relating to society, science and the environment, involving investigations and in-depth analysis, from a resolutely Canadian perspective.
Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

Also known as the ''Black Mozart'', the Chevalier de Saint-George was one of the most brilliant figures of 18th century Europe. An extraordinary violinist, adored orchestral conductor, he composed several operas and a number of lyrical works before sinking back into oblivion. A look back at his career.

The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Lévy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.
The televised news programme from TVMonaco.
All the news from RTS.

All the latest major events, presented, explained and analysed! Special guests and journalists in the studio analyse both the latest news but also other controversial issues to give us a better understanding of the social, political and cultural events occurring around us.

Gerald Watelet shines the spotlight on the people putting Belgium on the map. Expect reports on the best culture and heritage ambassadors, behind-the-scenes glimpses of elite events and profiles of those making headlines.

The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Lévy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.
Franck and Muffin have a new friend: Praline! In Burgundy, they meet horses, farm animals and dogs that are almost wolves.

The entire Madritsch family is finally all together for Mathias and Saruta's wedding. Lia continues her pilgrimage, following in the footsteps of her childhood in Cuba and visits her grandmother's tomb, in Guantanamo. The Swiss Guard mounts-up, ready for the journey home!

The memory of the living world, where nature is magnified and acclaimed, is masterfully portrayed in Miki Nakamura's paper artwork. Installations rich in beauty and finesse, yet never intended to make you forget that she was born in Hiroshima, Japan.
The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Télévisions editorial team.
The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauqué and Damien Thévenot at weekends.
A humorous look at working conditions for teachers through the trials and tribulations of five colleagues, unlike any others you've met.
The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauqué and Damien Thévenot at weekends.
We discover the prestigious universe of the Glorious Bresse, this famous poultry from Bresse culinary heritage.

Three contestants compete in a game of arrow crosswords, trying to complete the grids by finding the answers to the definitions provided. But to have access to those definitions, they first need to answer questions that all share one common characteristic: the response is always a letter.
The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.
Franck and Muffin have a new friend: Praline! In Burgundy, they meet horses, farm animals and dogs that are almost wolves.

Gerald Watelet shines the spotlight on the people putting Belgium on the map. Expect reports on the best culture and heritage ambassadors, behind-the-scenes glimpses of elite events and profiles of those making headlines.

Each day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box in the studio. But what's inside? One thing is certain, it's bound to contain a surprise that will lead them to discover a host of very different subjects: from guitars to trolls and even how to sort your waste for recycling!
programme.desc: Rocky & Lily : C'Est Dans La Boîte !

programme.title: Edmond the squirrel and Lucy the bear cub grew up together. They live in a majestic chestnut tree in the heart of the forest. With their friends they solve riddles and live thrilling adventures, with every day bringing new wonders to discover in the natural world around them.

The animal kingdom is brimming with creatures that have extraordinary powers. To reveal the incredible inventiveness of nature and the importance of protecting it, each episode takes us on a fascinating journey rich in poetry and humour.

Eight year-old Tata arrives in a new school. She wants to join its football team but isn't allowed to; after all she's a girl! Refusing to be beaten, Tata decides to set up her own girls' team with the help of her gang of friends.

When Chief refuses to let Hare become a member of his cabbage-lovers club, Alix suggested that he sets up a club of his own, for carrot-lovers. But she ends up torn between the two, when her friends insist she must choose.
We discover the prestigious universe of the Glorious Bresse, this famous poultry from Bresse culinary heritage.

The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Lévy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.
A general knowledge quiz.

''Temps Présent'' tackles current events broadly speaking. With its in-depth investigations and critical vision, the programme sheds light on the crises and the conflicts of our time, while denouncing the malfunctions of our society.
All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

During a performance at the Château de Blois, an industrialist is murdered as he plays the role of Henri III. Arthur, the young actor playing the Duke of Guise, becomes prime suspect. Police Captain Alice Deschamps heads the investigation with her ex and Arthur's father, Detective Inspector Denis Frécant.

Passionate about French chic, ambassadress Katherina Marx surrounds herself with major figures from the worlds of fashion, design, gastronomy, and fine living. Each episode features an iconic guest and a series of special reports, allowing viewers to discover or rediscover France, its young designers, and its chic and trendy hang-outs.

Wherever man is found, members of the crow family are nearby, watching. Since time immemorial, they have followed the hunters, farmers, soldiers and persecutors, scratching the soil in gardens, ploughed fields, battlefields... Crows and their cousins study us, passing on the knowledge gleaned to their offspring. Chronicle of an inquisition.
programme.desc: Corbeaux & Corneilles : La Nature Nous Observe !

programme.title: When Bobby and Par are left in charge of Ziggy's shop, they must resist jamming with the shop's musical treasures. // The family tries to stop their notorious chismoso Hector from gossiping all over town but can he stay quiet?
Rebecca offers advice to her peers and a superior that goes too far. Myles and Yasmine struggle to be partners until Charlie takes the lead with his advice.

Anika and Jennie try to get to the bottom of the mysterious VR headsets and make a disturbing discovery. Meanwhile, Oliver, Florian and Jasmyn are in for a shock of their own when they pay a visit to Florian's house.

Taylor and the gang discover a symbol that leads them on a treasure hunt all over Rock Island, resulting in an incredible discovery! Along the way they must protect their precious cake cargo - and deal with a menacing Raquel from the South Section.
Patrick messes with the space-time continuum. // While Cecil and Bunny celebrate their anniversary in outer space, Patrick and Squidina throw a house party.
Frustrated that he's seen as cute instead of evil, Plankton builds a robot to punish anyone who says "aww!" // Patrick crushes the mailman, so he and SpongeBob deliver the mail around Bikini Bottom.
Plankton joins the League of E.V.I.L. // SpongeBob and Patrick take Squidward on a plane to a tropical resort.
Squidward ventures to Nosferatu's castle after accidentally receiving his mail. // Nosferatu's minion Slappy kills some time around Bikini Bottom.
When Gargamel tries to transform into a Smurf, the Smurfs have to share their secrets to prove their identity.

When Gargamel convinces Dimwitty and Begonia that he is nice, they invite him to the village for a party. // Farmer and Vanity unearth a chest which contains a magnificent gem that brings bad luck to anyone who touches it!
When Ronnie Anne realizes that she's not up to date on all of the latest trends, she seeks help from Carlota. // Bobby struggles to find Sergio after wishing he would fly away and never come back.
Carlota worries that her family will embarrass her after her vlog is discovered by a famous musician. // Hector becomes Ronnie Anne and Carl's newest classmate after deciding to finish his schooling.
Ronnie Anne and Sid try to take down the obnoxious burger restaurant that opened up across the street. // After picking Par as his new best friend, Bobby realizes he may be in over his head.

When SpongeBob cooks at home, Mr. Krabs' customers leave his restaurant and head for SpongeBob's Place. // When Plankton gets kicked out of the house, it's up to SpongeBob to teach him how to win his computer wife back.

After a misunderstanding, SpongeBob and Patrick try to prove their life insurance protects them from any danger! // When SpongeBob blows himself a bubble boat, everyone in town wants one! Everyone except Mrs. Puff, that is.

Plankton closes the Chum Bucket and moves to a new town, but Mr. Krabs suspects he's still up to no good. // When SpongeBob accidentally picks up Neptune's magic trident, there's no telling what trouble he may cause!
Nosferatu's minion Slappy kills some time around Bikini Bottom.
Patrick and GrandPat try to pass each other on the stairs, leading to a ludicrous conflict. // The members of the Star family each confront their own absurd rivalries.
Carl hosts a haunted tour based on Abuela's tale of 'El Cucuy,' and learns that it may not be fiction.

Bobby's dream of playing in a band might finally come true, but can he hang with Par's punk pals? // Worried he's not keeping up with his cool friends, Sameer tries to break a record for some street cred.
Lori struggles to make a good impression on Bobby's dad after accidentally pushing him into a puddle. // Desperate to have the best show-and-tell in class, Lily takes Lisa's shrink ray to school.

Leni and Carlota's working styles clash when they are both interning for a famous fashion designer, Mariella Moss. // The Louds book a stay at an all-inclusive resort, only to find the vacation is not what they imagined.
Gargamel plants a crystal ball to spy on the Smurfs, but they turn the tables on him with a fabricated drama.

Vanity and Jokey start riding smurfboards around the village, but Brainy believes they're dangerous. // The Magic Supply Store mixes up Papa Smurf's and Gargamel's delivery orders, leaving Papa Smurf with a monkey!
Sandy tries to study SpongeBob and Patrick’s behavior, but her science experiment goes horribly awry. // Mr. Krabs takes Plankton’s advice, and finally marries the only thing he ever loved…money!

Pearl gets a job to be cool like her friends, but the only store that’s hiring is the lamest store at the mall! // SpongeBob loses the use of his thumbs, and must get them back in working order before his entire life falls apart.
SpongeBob builds a snail-house outside for Gary to play in while he is at work.

Lori becomes a celebrity at school when she hits a hole-in-one on a notoriously difficult course. // The cheerleaders challenge Lynn and her teammates to a 'cheer off' when Lynn dismisses them as athletes.
Lincoln tries to prove he’s mature enough to have dinner at the adult table, leaving the kiddie table behind him.

After Mom and Dad win a trip to a resort, they decide to take the kids - but only because they promised to behave. // When Lucy gets a crush on a 'regular and normal' boy, her sisters give her a makeover.
After discovering that Patrick never finished behavioral training, the family home-schools him.
Patrick and Squidina follow a runaway idea brick into Randomland.
Bubble Bass finds himself stranded with Patrick in a mysterious swamp, looking for a lost action figure.
After Lincoln manages to quickly put out a fire in the kitchen the family all assembles to get to the bottom of who set the fire in the first place!

Chloe, Jinx, and Booch are designing a new school mascot, but Max and Phoebe's fighting ruins the project. After Chloe expresses her anger toward her siblings, they realize their twin-fighting impacts Chloe in new ways now that they're guardians.

ShoutOut has a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to sell a movie to Hollywood bigshot Deuce Van Nuys, but when her mind goes blank under the pressure, the rest of Danger Force pitch in and share their own epic--and epically bad--movie ideas.
When Henry is caught sneaking out at night, he is grounded, preventing him from completing his crime-fighting duties. While Piper drives him crazy at home, Charlotte steps into the sidekick role.
The Ninja Turtles are on the run and...alone. Leonardo is a leader but who is he without anyone to lead? Leo now has to stop Bishop and her Mechazoids while trying to save his brothers.
programme.desc: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles

programme.title: Ronnie Anne and Sid try their best to look for an after school activity to do together. // When Maria finally gets a day off, Ronnie Anne has to compete with her family for some much-needed quality time.

The family discovers an amazing tamale cart and tries to keep it a secret from Abuela. // Ronnie Anne doesn't believe in an astrological prediction that 'love will find her,' until it seems to come true.
When Frida's fun dad comes to visit, Hector tries to win back his grandchildren's attention.
When Leaf gets sick, the weather in the Smurf Village starts to go wild. // When the Smurfs find a note from Gargamel begging for his mother because he's sick, they feel obliged to help him.
After discovering that Patrick never finished behavioral training, the family home-schools him.
Patrick and Squidina follow a runaway idea brick into Randomland.

Plankton travels two thousand years into the future and finds a few unfamiliar faces. // SpongeBob, Patrick, and Sandy find themselves in the middle of a long-standing feud between the Narwhals and the Planktons.
The Turtles take the fight to Bishop but she's ready for them... get ready for MECHA-BIHSOP! But when the Mechazoids go out of control, can the Turtles save humanity?
programme.desc: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles

programme.title: Eager to be named Kings of the Con at the Ace Savvy convention, Lincoln and Clyde convince the sisters to go with them as the Full Deck. // But the girls get more attention, leading the boys to do whatever it takes to gain focus.

To get out of doing things they don't like, Lana and Lola secretly switch places and pretend to be the other. // After causing Flip to get hurt, the kids sneak him into the attic to care for him without Mom and Dad knowing.

Max bets Phoebe she can't turn off being a superhero and go on a normal date. Chloe helps Phoebe do well on the date, but Max tries to sabotage it by crying wolf. Suddenly, a real supervillain emerges and puts Max and Chloe in serious danger.

When Danger Force borrows Ray's beloved Man Buggy without permission it falls into the hands of criminals Stupid Jeff and The Toddler. Now the team must track it down and get it back before Ray finds out.

Henry and the gang set up a secret underground restaurant in the Man Cave for Charlotte's private dinner with music superstar Jack Swagger. When word gets out that Jack Swagger is in town, some unwanted guests crash the party.

When a young girl chains herself outside of Junk-N-Stuff, Kid Danger and Captain Man are forced to help find her beloved phone. While on a stakeout, they unexpectedly run across some familiar faces with a devious plan they weren't prepared for.
Lincoln signs his family up for a talent show and they form a band. // It’s Dad’s annual Take Your Daughter to Work Day so Mom offers to take Lincoln to her work: a dental office.

Every April Fool’s Day, Luan pranks the entire household, but this year, Lincoln has a plan to not get pranked. // The Loud kids make a trip to the supermarket to do the grocery shopping for Mom, but Lincoln has other plans.

When Lincoln’s mom signs him up for peewee football, Lincoln schemes to have Lynn take his spot. // After Lucy reads Lincoln’s fortune and claims his day will “end in disaster”, Lincoln becomes a hypochondriac.
Raph's strength won't save him when he's caught between the Mechazoids and the notorious street gang known as Purple Dragons! Raph's going to have to use his head to get out of this one!
programme.desc: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles

programme.title: A new secret Krabby Patty formula has disastrous results for Bikini Bottom, and only SpongeBob can save the day. // Mr. Krabs and Plankton have to take boating school classes. Thankfully, SpongeBob's there to show them the ropes!
When Mr. Krabs gets in trouble for littering, he makes SpongeBob and Squidward clean up Bikini Bottom. // A sea bunny ravages Squidward's garden, but SpongeBob thinks it's cute!

When his clarinet goes missing, Squidward must become a hardboiled detective to track it down. // Squidward sends SpongeBob and Patrick on an increasingly difficult scavenger hunt to get them out of his hair.
SpongeBob's new friend is a giant fluffy hamster. There's one problem, though: no one else can see him! // Patrick wants to be a horse!
The Patrick Star Show is interrupted by a most peculiar stench. // Squidina hires an assistant who's a little too good at his job.
The Star Family heads to their favorite resort. // Bunny goes on a mid-day adventure to a forgotten age.

When Cleo and Nefera babysit unruly werewolf triplets, Nefera must accept that she can learn from her younger sister. // Barkimedes includes Buddy in a human-themed game at Monster High, but Buddy realizes the game is entirely wrong about humans.

When Ghoulia's anxiety manifests as a monster, she hurries to get rid of it before an appointment with the school counselor. // Worried for Frankie's safety, the Drs. Stein reprogram Frankie's latest robot invention to protect them at all costs!

After hearing about a contest to find El Falcon's next sidekick, Carl becomes El Pollito and tries to win! Once Carlitos falls asleep, Carl and CJ must conduct all their playing - and fighting - in absolute silence!
Sid faces off against Lisa Loud in the Great Lakes City robotics competition! // When faced with a deadline and no inspiration, Frida tries to use Lalo's paintings as her own!

Zion gets another shot at repairing his relationship with his wife, Erin by a wish on a well to go back in time. But he finds Erin not knowing him at all. He must now correct his mistakes and make her fall in love with him again.
